text:
Surely it won't be long before the Kardashian-Jenner children have their own reality show, judging by their continued domination on social media.

Related Story Kardashian-Jenner Babies Are Taking Over Instagram

To celebrate True Thompson's half-birthday, Khloé Kardashian threw the most adorable "Cousin Cupcake Party" for the babies in the family. And as usual, the Kardashians prove themselves to be the world's party planners extraordinaire, from the decadent looking snacks, to the gorgeous decorations.

Sitting on a pink blanket, next to a plate of the cutest cupcakes, baby True is surrounded by all of her baby cousins. Kylie Jenner's daughter Stormi is to True's right, while on her left, Kim Kardashian's daughter Chicago West makes a grab for the prettiest sponge cake. And next to Chicago is her little brother Saint, who doesn't seem happy that Chi is getting to the cake first, which is understandable.

And making her first appearance in a group photo with the other babies is Dream Kardashian, Rob's daughter with Blac Chyna. It's so nice to see Dream included in a group hang-out like this:

People points out that Kourtney's children—Penelope, Mason, and Reign—are missing from the party, as is Kim's daughter, North West. But even though the older cousins aren't in the sweet baby photo, Kim shared the most adorable photo of baby True playing with North:

Later on, in her Instagram Stories, Khloé shared a photo in which she sits with the baby cousins during the party, and of course she's wearing pink for the occasion:

And the selection of snacks served looked super delicious:

Basically, the Kardashian-Jenner "Cousin Cupcake Party" is the celebration of 2018 to beat.

Related Story Kim Kardashian Is a Billionaire Now
title: Khloé Kardashian Throws 'Cousin Cupcake Party' for True Thompson's Half-Birthday
